module.description:
Using an action from mod_balance also activates a backlog: lighttpd2 will then put requests in a backlog if no backend is available and try again later.
Be careful: the referenced actions may get executed more than once (until one is successful!), so don't loop rewrites in them or something similar.

action.name: balance.rr
action.short: balance between actions (list or single action) with Round-Robin
action.description: Round-Robin (rr) the requests are distributed equally over all backends.

action.name: balance.sqf
action.short: balance between actions (list or single action) with SQF
action.description: Shortest-Queue-First (sqf) is similar to Round-Robin and prefers the backend with the shortest wait-queue.
